items.sentence: If Tom isn't careful, he's going to break that.
What Tom is doing is likely to make Mary angry.
I don't really understand what Tom wants to do.
No one asked Tom why he'd been in the hospital.
Tom sat at the kitchen table, peeling potatoes.
Tom has suggested that we get an earlier start.
Tom left early in order to avoid the rush hour.
Tom started going bald when he was quite young.
We won't start the meeting until Tom gets here.
Our city has one third as many people as Tokyo.
